questions.dataJson: [{"SortOrder":0,"Content":"以洁面乳清洁面部皮肤","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":1,"Content":"每日2次30℃温水湿敷","IsAnswer":true},{"SortOrder":2,"Content":"局部涂润肤霜保持面部湿润","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":3,"Content":"外出应涂防晒霜防止皮肤受损","IsAnswer":false},{"SortOrder":4,"Content":"多晒太阳，保持皮肤健康","IsAnswer":false}]
